#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
int t;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t-->0){

		int a,b,n;
		cin>>a>>b>>n;
		int diff=b-a;
		int dp[diff+2];
		for(int i=0;i<=diff+1;i++)
		    dp[i]=9999999;
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
			int x,y;
			cin>>x>>y;
			if(dp[y]>x)
			{
			    dp[y]=x;
				for(int j=1;j<=diff-y;j++){
				    if(dp[j+y]>dp[j]+dp[y])
					   dp[j+y]=dp[j]+dp[y];

				 }

			}
		}
		if(dp[diff]!=9999999)
		printf("The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is %d.\n",dp[diff]);
		else
         printf("This is impossible.\n");


}
return 0;
}
